greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(2*n) = 2*n and a(2*n-1) = A054569(n).
comment: Equals the Row2 triangle sums of the Connell sequence A001614 as a triangle. The Row2(n) triangle sums are defined by Row2(n) = sum((-1)^(n+k)*T(n,k), k=1..n), see A180662.
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, May 18 2011
